meanings.definition: Of or relating to cinnamic acid.
meanings.sent1: The cinnamic aroma filled the room with a sweet scent.
meanings.sent2: Her perfume had a cinnamic fragrance that lingered in the air.
meanings.sent3: The cinnamic candle made the whole house smell like a cozy bakery.
meanings.sent4: The cinnamic essence of the flowers painted a vivid picture of spring.
meanings.sent5: The cinnamic flavor of the tea was warm and comforting on a cold day.

meanings.definition: Containing or derived from cinnamic acid.
meanings.sent1: The skincare product boasted cinnamic properties for healthy skin.
meanings.sent2: The cinnamic compound in the medicine helped alleviate pain.
meanings.sent3: The chef added a dash of cinnamic spice to the dish for an extra kick.
meanings.sent4: Her artwork was inspired by the cinnamic colors of nature.
meanings.sent5: The cinnamic extract from the plant was used in traditional medicine.
